abstract: Glenn R Rink, chief executive of environmental services company AbTech Industries, testifies in corruption case against New York State Sen Dean Skelos and his son Adam Skelos that elder Skelos provided company with valuable business intelligence following Hurricane Sandy; testimony marks first admission that Sen Skelos directly assisted company, which was set to sign consulting contract with his son.
lead_paragraph: The testimony by Glenn R. Rink of AbTech Industries was the first time jurors had heard that the state senator directly assisted the company, which was about to sign a consulting contract with his son.

headline.main: Executive Says Dean Skelos Provided Valuable Business Intelligence
headline.print_headline: Executive Says Skelos Provided Valuable Intelligence

snippet: The testimony by Glenn R. Rink of AbTech Industries was the first time jurors had heard that the state senator directly assisted the company, which was about to sign a consulting contract with his son.
